item.title: Say Anything - Is a Real Boy
item.author: ryan@ryanl.ee (Ryan Lee)
item.description: I can't get laid in this town without these pointy fuckin’ shoes Oh he sure do have woe. Favorite Tracks: Woe, Alive With the Glory of Love, The Futile, Every Man Has a Molly, I Want to Know Your Plans, Admit It!!!, Wow I Can Get Sexual Too, Total Revenge

item.title: My Chemical Romance - Three Cheers for Sweet Revenge
item.author: ryan@ryanl.ee (Ryan Lee)
item.description: You like D&D, Audrey Hepburn, Fangoria, Harry Houdini, and croquet. You can't swim, you can't dance, and you don't know karate. Face it, you're never gonna make it. It's a damn fun album. You people remember fun, right? Favorite tracks: Helena, To the End, I'm Not Okay (I Promise), Thank You for the Venom
